# Song Rank - songrank.dev

> Rank your favorite songs using a merge-sort algorithm powered by Spotify.

Song Rank is a free web application that lets users authenticate with Spotify, select an artist or playlist, and rank songs through pairwise comparisons. The merge-sort algorithm produces a complete ranking that can be shared publicly.

## Features

- Spotify OAuth authentication
- Artist and playlist song ranking
- Merge-sort pairwise comparison algorithm
- Resumable ranking sessions
- Public ranking sharing and exploration
- Comments on public rankings
- User profiles and dashboards

## Links

- Website: https://songrank.dev (also https://song-rank.com)
- About: https://songrank.dev/about
- FAQ: https://songrank.dev/faq
- Support: https://songrank.dev/support
- Terms: https://songrank.dev/terms
- Explorer: https://songrank.dev/explore
